lastuse_1.Description: Have you ever used nicotine in your lifetime?(This includes cigarettes, e-cigarettes, smokeless tobacco, etc.)

lastuse_1a.Description: When was the last time you used nicotine?

lastuse_2.Description: If possible, could you provide a specific Date and Time of the last nicotine usage?

lastuse_3.Description: Do you drink caffeine?(coffee, caffeinated soda/pop, tea, etc)

lastuse_4.Description: How many caffeinated drinks do you have per day?

lastuse_5.Description: How many caffeinated drinks do you have per week?

lastuse_6.Description: When was the last time you had something caffeinated?

lastuse_7.Description:
What type of caffeinated drinks do you normally have on a weekly basis?
(coffee, green/black tea, Starbucks, soda)
